segments.text: I keep returning to the woman at the sink, and honestly, her obliviousness is starting to make me angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the gushing water or feel the puddle spreading around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she's intentionally ignoring everything happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are literally committing a cookie crime right behind her back!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking a clear rule, and she's completely out of the loop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her singular focus on that plate is bordering on negligent, in my opinion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she have any peripheral awareness of her household?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I understand being absorbed in a task, but this is a whole other level of detachment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch such obvious hazards go unaddressed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene here before things escalate further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This isn't just a minor oversight; it's a significant lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe her serene expression while her kitchen is turning into a swimming pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are going to get away with all the cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just infuriating to witness this level of unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She really needs to snap out of it.
segments.speaker: PAR
